```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# Attach packages

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Read in data
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score))+
  geom_hex() + labs(x = "% White Population", y = "CalEnviroScreen Pollution Burden Score")
```
